title: First it seemed kinda strange
brief_description: Les’s parents divorced five years ago and he then went to live with his mother. He visits his father and stepmother on weekends and vacations and seems to have adjusted to this arrangement. This film raises issues surrounding social awareness and self awareness; divorce; family roles and relationships; and communication. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
